text: I always take every opportunity to advocate for the men and women of organized labor. Pleased to have a moment recently with President of @UFWupdates Teresa Romero and thank her for all of her tireless efforts to improve working conditions and fair compensation. https://t.co/qIvDFYukTq

Great to meet recently with President/CEO Jennifer Trowbridge and the fantastic members of @NWICA to discuss their dedication to assist individuals and families in economic hardship. https://t.co/6yFOKYOcxR

Pleased that my amendment to the TSA Workforce Act was approved in a floor vote and included in the final passage of this legislation. Proud to advocate for TSA workplace safety and ensure all workers have a safe and productive work environment. https://t.co/wC8e55Iiby

Spoke on the House floor earlier this week in support of the urgent completion of the America Competes Act.  This legislation is critical to addressing our nationâ€™s pressing inflationary challenges and supply chain pressures. https://t.co/wUuqOhbRUX
Look forward to voting today for the CSBG Modernization Act, which will deliver resources to organizations across our nation that help Americans achieve economic security.
This #NationalPoliceWeek, I thank all the dedicated men and women in law enforcement who keep our communities safe and secure every day. https://t.co/ejgZhUskjh
